SEARCH
Package org.team21.game.controllers

Class ReinforcementController

java.lang.Object
org.team21.game.controllers.ReinforcementController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameFlowManager
public class ReinforcementController extends Object implements GameFlowManager
This class represents the controller responsible for managing the Reinforcement phase of the game. It implements the GameFlowManager interface. This controller handles the calculation and distribution of reinforcement armies to players based on the number of countries they control.
Version:
: 1.0.0
Author:
: Yesha Shah

    • startPhase

      public GamePhase startPhase(GamePhase p_GamePhase) throws ValidationException, InvalidExecutionException
      Begins the Reinforcement phase of the game.
      Specified by:
      startPhase in interface GameFlowManager
      Parameters:
      p_GamePhase - The current game phase.
      Returns:
      The next game phase upon successful execution.
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if there is invalid input or output.
      InvalidExecutionException - if there is an invalid game phase command.
